description: [Pillowmint](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0517) has used shellcode which reads code stored in the registry keys \REGISTRY\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\DRM using the native Windows API as well as read HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\System\CurrentControlSet\Services\Tcpip\Parameters\Interfaces as part of its C2.(Citation: Trustwave Pillowmint June 2020)

external_references.description: Trustwave SpiderLabs. (2020, June 22). Pillowmint: FIN7â€™s Monkey Thief . Retrieved July 27, 2020.
